AltName.entry: FRIENDS OF THE GENERAL CEMETERY (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: Aims to protect the landscape, wildlife, architecture and monuments in the General Cemetery from neglect and vandalism and to develop a strategy of restoration, maintenance and conservation. Has an events programme with talks and specialist tours on request. Volunteers are welcome.

Pubs.entry: Undertakings, newsletter; Remote and Undisturbed, a history of the General Cemetery; Geological Guide; Into the Valley of Death, a military graves guide; Dead Good, children's book; She Lived Unknown, history of women buried in the cemetery; Post Mortem

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Tues at 10am-12noon (light landscaping and litterpicking with volunteers), Fri 2-4pm (gardening group), 1st Sun in the month at 2pm (historical tours)
